item.description:
CLASS IS $30 PER CLASS

LADIES 2 CLASSES FOR $55

MEN 2 CLASSES FOR $55

$20 PER CLASS FOR INSTRUCTOR

THE REST TOWARDS AIRLINE FEE

MESSAGE FROM SARAH

Hello Boston Family! Boy I have missed you and hope you missed me to. During my absence, I hope you have been practicing! Because I am bringing it! New moves include: footwork, spins, turns, complex combinations and new music! Are you ready? I hope so! See you at the end of the month from October 27 - October 31 (yelp! Thursday - Monday), that's a lot of steppin baby! We are going to have fun! See you then...Practice ! Practice ! Practice !

THIS IS ANOTHER MARATHON WEEKEND

Thursday - All Levels 6 p.m. no regular class

Friday - Privates

Saturday Men's  11 a.m.

and Sarah Saturday Advance Intermediates 2 to 4

Saturday Steppin at Slades 4:30 to 7 no charge featuring, dance with Sara and Dj Bright Eyes

Saturday Masquerade Ball 9 p.m. sharp $10 at the door

Sunday FOOTWORK, TURNS AND SPINS   PLUS WALKIN...THIS IS A ADVANCE CLASS ONLY AND YOU MUST BE GROUNDED IN YOU BASICS.
item.how_to_find_us: ADVANCED STEPPERS ONLY.....MEN WE NEED YOU FOR WALKIN....

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006
